key_talking_points: Penalty on Edmonton's Cody Ceci for holding the stick. Florida goes to the power play with 17:06 remaining in the first period.
Carter Verhaeghe with a shot on goal, saved by Stuart Skinner. Florida is pressing early while up by one goal.
Edmonton needs to capitalize on opportunities to tie the game before Florida extends their lead.
for_commentary_agent.context: The game is close and there was a penalty followed by a shot on goal. This warrants mixed coverage to discuss the implications of the penalty and the scoring chance.

high_intensity_events.summary: Penalty: Holding the stick called on Cody Ceci (EDM) at 02:54
Shot on goal by Carter Verhaeghe (FLA) at 02:57

task_details.specific_guidance: Analyze the Florida power play setup and Edmonton's penalty kill strategy. Discuss the importance of this power play given the score and period.
